instructions: Cut ribs into serving-size pieces; place in a large resealable plastic bag.
Combine remaining ingredients; pour half the marinade over the ribs.
Seal bag and turn to coat; refrigerate for several hours or overnight, turning bag occasionally.
Drain and discard marinade from ribs.
Place ribs on a rack in a greased shallow baking pan.
Cover and bake at 350 degrees F for 1 hour.
Bake, uncovered, for 30-45 minutes or until meat is tender, brushing occasionally with pan juices.
title: Honey-Garlic Pork Ribs
steps: Cut ribs into serving-size pieces; place in a large resealable plastic bag. Combine remaining ingredients; pour half the marinade over the ribs. Seal bag and turn to coat; refrigerate for several hours or overnight, turning bag occasionally. Cover and refrigerate remaining marinade.

Drain and discard marinade from ribs. Place ribs on a rack in a greased shallow baking pan. Cover and bake at 350 degrees F for 1 hour. Drain. Pour reserved marinade over ribs. Bake, uncovered, for 30-45 minutes or until meat is tender, brushing occasionally with pan juices.
